questions.q: How can I join a project?
questions.a: You can join a project by registering an account and clicking the 'Join Project' button on any active project card.
We ensure maximum transparency through collaborative management and real-time tracking of all project activities.
Each project is managed by a committee of members elected by the community, overseen by the foundation.
